### OriginPeriod
OriginPeriod is the 
Loss reserving data is a set of longitudinal data, each member of which corresponds to an origin period. This origin period may be an accident period, policy period, report period or possibly something else. Events are typically aggregated across annual periods and we may speak of accident years, underwriting years and so forth.
